publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1599 Ross Finnie: Draft Code for Recommendations for the Welfare of Livestock: Sheep—That the Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Code of Recommendations for the Welfare of Livestock: Sheep be approved. Supported by: Rhona Brankin*
